data.title: Travis Barker and Shanna Moakler's Relationship: Details and Drama
data.meta_description: Everything you need to know about Travis Barker and Shanna Moakler's relationship, from their drama, to their reality show, to their kids.
data.text:
You may have noticed that Shanna Moakler‚Äôs name has been popping up all over your newsfeed lately due to her having some‚Ä¶opinions‚Ä¶about Travis Barker dating Kourtney Kardashian. Whether she‚Äôs subposting Kourtney on Instagram, telling followers that her mom doesn‚Äôt like the Kardashians (still not over that), or randomly showing off her Travis tattoo, Shanna is simply out here doing the most. Which kinda makes sense considering she‚Äôs Travis‚Äôs ex-wife and the mother of his kids? But it also makes zero sense given that they haven‚Äôt been together for a literal decade. Either way, Travis and Shanna have a lot of history‚Äîfrom their Myspace feuds to their reality show. Behold, everything you need to know about their slightly chaotic relationship.

They Got Married All the Way Back in 2004

Travis proposed to Shanna at Disney Land‚Äôs Haunted Mansion, and they proceeded to have a Nightmare Before Christmas‚Äìthemed wedding. Here for it!

They Broke Up More Than 10 Full Years Ago

Like‚Ä¶they haven‚Äôt been together In. A. Minute. Which seems noteworthy due to the sheer number of thoughts Shanna has about Travis‚Äôs relationship with Kourtney. But to be fair, they‚Äôve had a lot of ups and downs. Travis filed for divorce from Shanna two years after their wedding, and then they got back together twice before finalizing their split in 2008.

Their Split Was Super Messy

By which I mean they spent time dragging each other on Myspace, lol. These posts have looong since been removed, but basically, Travis accused Shanna of cheating in a blog on his Myspace, and she then gave a statement to TMZ, saying in part, ‚ÄúIf that Myspace site was truly created by Travis, then I‚Äôm seriously concerned for his mental well-being. The picture he paints is so far-fetched that I can‚Äôt believe this is his reality. If it is, then I‚Äôm truly concerned for him. Perhaps the lifestyle he leads is taking its toll on him.‚Äù

Travis even went so far as to give a straight-up Q&A-style interview about his split to People in 2006, saying Shanna used to ‚Äúegg‚Äù his friends: ‚ÄúShe was unfortunately in a relationship before where someone was unfaithful to her and she told me when we first met that it scared her. I understood that going into it, but I didn‚Äôt know it would be to the extreme that it was. To the point where I couldn‚Äôt have friends that were girls and I couldn‚Äôt hang out with my guy friends. They would get egged if they came to my house.‚Äù

Nowadays, They Co-Parent Their Kids

Travis and Shannon share two children together: 17-year-old Landon Asher Barker and 15-year-old Alabama Luella Barker. Travis is also extremely close to his stepdaughter, Atiana Cecilia De La Hoya. Back in April 2020 (so before Trav and Kourt got together), Shanna told Hollywood Life that co-parenting their kids was ‚Äúgoing great!‚Äù

They Had a Reality Show Together

Anyone else remember Meet the Barkers? Truly, me neither due to repressing that time of my life deep into the recesses of my brain, but here‚Äôs the intro. It‚Äôs a lot!

Somewhat amusingly, Travis opened up about the reality show to Khlo√© Kardashian on the award-deserving series Kocktails With Khlo√©, saying, ‚ÄúIt was so real that I didn‚Äôt feel any type of way. It was like what was really going down. There was just cameras documenting it.‚Äù

Shanna Has a ‚ÄúTravis‚Äù Tattoo

We know this thanks to her decision to show it off directly after Travis debuted his Kourtney tattoo on Instagram:

In a video of Shanna talking to paps obtained by TMZ, she mused, ‚ÄúI have [seen the tattoo], yeah, it‚Äôs beautiful, yeah, it‚Äôs nice, it‚Äôs nice. Welcome to the club, he‚Äôs got a couple more on there too.‚Äù

Oh, and when asked if Travis has her name tattooed, she said, ‚ÄúYeah, he does, he has my name. Now it‚Äôs her turn. It‚Äôs her turn to get his name on her.‚Äù

Speechless.

Shanna Thinks Travis Is Copying Their Romantic Moments for Kourtney

You know how Travis hired a plane to say ‚ÄúHappy Birthday Kourtney‚Äù in THE SKY?

Well, apparently, he did this for Shanna first and she‚Äôs not thrilled. ‚ÄúShanna‚Äôs moved on from Travis, but it‚Äôs been hurtful that everything he‚Äôs doing for Kourtney, he did before for her, like the plane flying overhead, the flowers. It‚Äôs all exactly the same,‚Äù a source tells People. ‚ÄúShanna and Travis are cordial with each other and are friendly‚Äîthey have a long history together. Again, she‚Äôs moved on from Travis and has her own boyfriend and life, but this is just hurtful to her.‚Äù

Of course, Shanna herself has made it, um, clear that she‚Äôs not particularly here for the Kardashians in general. By which I mean she responded ‚Äúmine too‚Äù when an Insta follower commented, ‚ÄúMy mama likes everyone besides the Kardashians üòÇüòÇüòÇ.‚Äù

Also, let‚Äôs not forget that she posted this‚Ä¶.

Welp. This has been a journey!
